body.p: Norway is strongly involved in the war on international terrorism. It can only be won by making use of a wide range of methods, including political, humanitarian, economic, legal and military means.

In the short-term, it is important to prevent planned terrorist attacks through active endeavours on the part of the police and the armed forces. In the long-term, we must focus on the factors that make individuals choose the path of terrorism. Norwayâ€™s work on peace processes, democratisation and development are therefore important contributions to the overall war on international terrorism.
